title: Trove
description: Trove is the personalization and content engine of WaPo Labs. The Trove API provides basic text analytics services, URL lookup for news articles, as well as a constantly updated set of news around any topic, which we call a Trove channel. Trove.com is an example implementation of the API and a helpful interface for creating or tuning Trove channels.Find WaPo Labs at wapolabs.com!
